※<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Windmill<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> changes to <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Rising Windmill<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> while under the effect of <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>En Avant<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
※<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Bladeshower<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> changes to <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Bloodshower<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> while under the effect of <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>En Avant<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
※Action changes to <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Entrechat<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> while dancing.

Executes the following weaponskills in succession:

2. <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Gofu<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
